english: Mr. Ural ordered me to kill Tekfur.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'i de, Alplerini de öldürün hemen!
english: Kill Mr. Ertugrul and his Alps now!

text: her daim bize adaletin yanında olmayı sen söyledin
english: You've always told us to be on the side of justice.

text: Müsaade et, bu adamın ne söylediğini herkes işitsin
english: Let everyone hear what this man is saying.

text: Kutluca da, ben de adaletin yanında dururuz baba!
english: Celebration and I stand by justice, Father!

text: Kan kardeşin yiğit Toktamış Bey'i de

english: The man who ordered Taekfur's death
We'd like to have the temptress on trial.
They're already at each other's throats.

text: Bu gece bitmeden bu iş bitmiş olacak
english: It'll be over before tonight's over.

text: Emir Sadeddin çok akıllı biri. Mutlaka karşı hamlesi olacaktır
english: Emir Sadaddin is a very smart man.

text: Fakat bu hamlesi benim işime yarayacak
english: But this move will be useful to me.

text: Bir de Helena meselesi var efendim
Hani onu daha fazla kalede tutamayız
english: We can't keep him in the castle any longer.

text: Kayılara çok fazla güveniyor Bizi sırtımızdan vurabilir
english: He trusts the apricots too much. He can hit us in the back.
He doesn't shoot her in the back, Peter.

text: Tekfur'un ölümünü bahane edip Bizans'tan ordu istemiş
english: Tekfur's death was an excuse to ask Byzantine for an army.

text: Komutan aklını mı yitirmiş Emir Hazretleri?
english: Has the Commander lost his mind, Your Highness?

text: Taşlar şimdi yerine oturmaya başladı Candar Bey
english: The stones are now falling into place Mr. Candar
It's obvious who the killer is.

text: acını hafifletir diye babanın katili hakkında haber vermeye geldim
english: I'm here to inform you about your father's murder in case it eases your pain.
First there's gonna be a trial, then he's gonna die.
Helena, we don't judge without a trial.

text: Hem bu işin ardında kimler vardır bilmek gerekir
english: Besides, you need to know who's behind this.

text: Ama merak etmeyesin, katil de, sahibi de bu işten kurtulamaz
english: But don't worry, the killer and the owner won't get away with it.
It's Mr. Ural of the Rye Obama.
The killer must have been in his room.
I can't wait till they're dead.

text: Hatta ölüm fermanını duyduklarında yüzlerini görmek isterim
english: I'd even like to see their faces when they hear the death warrant.
I'll spit in the faces of those who did this to my father.

text: Tekfur'u Ural'ın öldürmediğini ikimiz de biliyoruz
english: We both know Ural didn't kill Tekfur.

text: Madem Tekfur'un koltuğunu bu kadar istiyorsun
english: Since you want Tekfur's seat so bad

text: Yok eğer illaki savaş çıkartacağım dersen
english: No, if you say you're going to start a war.
Your armies will be destroyed before they leave Iznik.

text: Bu da sana Emir Sadeddin Köpek sözüdür
english: This is the word of the dog of the Emir Sadaddin.
So I'll give you Tekfur's killer.

text: Sen de onu alıp imparatora vereceksin
english: And you will take it and give it to the emperor.
And you'll be the new Tekfur

text: Çolpan'ım, bu ayrı geçirdiğimiz son gecemiz olacak
english: Cholpan, this will be our last night apart.

text: Gayrı bundan sonra ölüm bile ayıramayacak bizi
english: After that, even death won't be able to separate us
Get a hold of yourself, Cholpan.
Think of our baby in your belly, Cholpan, huh?
Where are you taking our gentleman?

text: Topraklarımızı işgal eden Türklerin işini hemen bitirmeyeceğim
english: I'm not going to finish off the Turks who invaded our land right now.

text: Biraz daha acı çekerek ölsünler istiyorum
english: I want them to die with a little more pain.

text: Ben savaştan vazgeçmem hiçbir zaman Petrus
english: I never give up on war, Peter.
Now you listen to me, Peter.

text: Bugün Hanlı Pazar'da Ural'la Laskaris'in mahkemesi olacak
english: Today will be the court of Ural and Laskaris at Hanlı Sunday.
They'll be taken to Iconia for the execution of their punishment.
And you run them down on the road.
My dear friend and I have business to attend to.
I'll be there with my men.

text: Laskaris denen şahsın itirafları ve ele geçen deliller
english: The confessions and evidence of a man called Laskaris

text: Sizin diyeceğiniz bir şey var mı?
english: Do you have anything to say?
The decision is appropriate for us

text: Ural Bey, Alp'i Batuhan'la bir olup
english: Mr. Ural, you've joined the Alps with Batuhan.
And it's been proven that he burned your rugs.

text: Her kim kan etse, katli müstahak ise
kısas oluna ve eğer sulh edip
english: To be fair, and if you make peace,
Or if he's entitled to a diet.

text: Obanın beyi olarak son kararın nedir?
english: What's your final decision as Oban's master?
I'd like an eye for an eye, Your Eminence.
With a weapon that can't be proven

text: Ural Bey'in Laskaris ile bir olup

english: It's been decided that they've slaughtered Tekfur.
Under the supervision of the court committee
The brain of an honorable oban
You can't condemn him with these slanders.
I will avenge you for this.

text: Ölsem de obam, Kayılardan bunun hesabını soracak
english: Even if I die, my brother will be punished by the apricots.

text: Gayrı iki cihanda da ellerim yakanızda olacak
english: I'll have my hands on both of you.
You're the reason for all this!

text: Candar Bey nefes almakta zorlanır Ural Bey
english: Mr. Candar has trouble breathing, Mr. Ural.
You're still looking for a fight.

text: Yaşadığın her güne lanet edeceksin Ertuğrul
english: You'll curse every day you live, Ertugrul.

text: Ölsem de obam bunun intikamını alacak
english: Even if I die, Obam will avenge it.
Let him say good-bye to his girl.

text: Derin nefes alasın Candar Bey, koklayasın
english: Take a deep breath Mr. Candar, smell it

text: Dua et uç beyim yaşasın Ertuğrul
english: You better pray my master lives Ertuğrul

text: Candar Bey senin mekânında Hakk'a yürümesin
english: Don't let Mr. Candar walk to Hakk in your place.
Those who can't handle it will be crushed under your command Sadeddin

text: Bu koca cihanda bir sen dürüstsün, öyle mi Ertuğrul?
english: You're the only one who's honest about this whole thing, right, Ertugrul?

text: Bir sen savaşırsın adalet için, öyle mi?
english: You're the only one who fights for justice, huh?

text: Siyaset, Sırat Köprüsü gibi kıldan ince
english: Politics is as thin as the Line Bridge
It's a long way from the sword.

text: Senin yüzünden bütün dengeler alt üst oldu
english: Because of you, all balances have been turned upside down.
His heir's head is at the edge of his sword

text: sen hâlâ daha dürüstlükten bahsedersin bana
english: You can still tell me more about honesty.

text: Ömrüm boyunca hep senin gibi bir kadın aradım
english: All my life I've been looking for a woman like you

text: Nihayet hayatımın en zor en karanlık döneminde
english: Finally, in the darkest hour of my life

text: yolumu gösteren bir yıldız gibi çıktın karşıma
english: You show up like a star in my path

text: Her şeyimi kaybettiğimde beni hayata bağladın
english: When I lost everything, you connected me to life.
Now they're gonna take you away from me.
I couldn't keep my promises to you, my Cholpan.
I couldn't account for your father's killers.
I couldn't name our child after him.

text: Hele onu büyütürken yanında olamayacağımı düşündükçe
english: Especially when I think I'm not gonna be around to raise him.
How can I live without you?
Don't let him see you surrender before you die.

text: Senin ve benim intikamımızı almak evladımıza nasip olacak
english: It will be our child's revenge to avenge you and me.

text: Çolpan yıldızının ışığı, ona yol gösterecek
english: The light of the cholpan star will guide him

text: Damarlarında kan değil babasının öfkesi dolaşacak
english: His father's anger will run through his veins, not blood.
Your breath hasn't healed yet, Mr. Candar.

text: ben buraya oğlumun kellesini götürmek için gelmedim
english: I'm not here to take my son's head.
Not until we've had our revenge.
I know death is forbidden to both of us.
But you'll have to wait a little longer.
You won't listen to me, you might as well listen to your daughter.
Your heart won't stand for it.

text: Her daim adaletin yanında olmamı emreden babamın izinden gittim
english: I followed in the footsteps of my father who ordered me to stand by justice all the time.

text: bir yetimin hakkına tecavüz eden ben olsam
english: If I were the one who violated an orphan's rights

text: Sen de, Ertuğrul da belanızı bulasınız!
english: You and Ertugrul will be in trouble!
You took it away from me.
I'll have my hands on you both.

text: Sakın bir daha bizim yüzümüze bakmayasın
english: Don't you ever look at us again.
Don't stand in front of us and beg us

♪ Don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't.
I wish you well, Mr. Candar.
The son you've put me through

text: Evlat acısından bu kadar korkuyordun da
english: Son, you were so afraid of your pain.

text: evladın onca zulmü yaparken neden konuşmadın hiç Candar Bey?
english: Why didn't you speak, Mr. Candar, when your son was so cruel?

text: Şimdi karşıma geçmiş eşkıya gibi tehditler savurursun
english: Now you're going to threaten me like a bandit.

text: Dediklerimin kuru bir tehdit olmadığını anlayacaksınız
english: You'll find that what I'm saying isn't a dry threat.
I'm going to wipe you out.

text: Lakin biz yanlış bir şey yapmadık
english: But we didn't do anything wrong.
I will punish you with justice."

text: İmdi sen de Allah'ın adaletine boynunu eğ
english: Now, obey the law of God.
Instead of arguing with us here
Go say good-bye to your son.
I'm going to see my son.

text: Beyinizle birlikte belanızı siz de bulacaksınız
english: You'll find trouble with your master.

text: Ertuğrul Bey denen o adi mahlûka ticaretimizi demeseydim
english: If I hadn't said our trade in that vile creature Ertugrul Bey

text: Cevval hatun dedim, dağ gibi hatun dedim

text: Dar zamanında Ertuğrul Bey'imize yoldaş oldu dedim
english: In his narrow time, I said he was a companion to our Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Dedim kardeş, dedim de şu olanlara bakasın
english: I said, brother, I said, look what's happening.

text: O da o ihtiyarın gölgesinde yalan oldu gitti
english: And he lied in that old man's shadow.
He's a brother He's a brother

english: He's a brother. I'll be damned if he's a brother.

text: Abi Ne abisi ha? Ne abisi?
Sen ne yüzle karşıma çıkıyorsun benim?

He must tear his flesh to shreds

He lured her into his mind.

text: Kadılar gelmeyeydi her şey istediğimiz gibi olacaktı
english: The ladies were coming. Everything was going to be just the way we wanted it to be.
We'll see when the time comes.

text: Keşke abimin kefaretini ben ödeyebilseydim beyim
english: I wish I could pay my brother's penance, sir.
It's like going to a holiday prayer.
I'd put my neck under the executioner's sword

english: The sword of justice is so sharp, Mr. Aliyar

text: yeri gelir tutanın da elini keser

text: Lakin akacak kan bize Hakk'ın yolunu gösterir
english: But the blood that flows will lead us to Hakk.

We want this to be over quickly.
Even if it's fair and fair

english: You're in such a hurry to execute the sentence.

text: veda etmek için bir imkân verin

text: Adaletin hası, tez gelenidir Emir Hazretleri

text: bu meseleyi tez vakitte halletmemizi istediler
english: They want us to settle this matter quickly.

text: Alplerinizin kanını temizlemek de size düşer
english: It's up to you to clean the blood of your Alps.
You do what needs to be done.
The son of a bitch Ertugrul before he's extinct.
I'll live to take your breath away
The prisoner will come with us.
You deserve to stand up straight.

text: Bana verdiğin sözlerle ben düğünüme gider gibiyim
english: With the promises you gave me, it's like I'm going to my wedding.
Don't take that joy away from me
I'll make your revenge grow inside me
Your blood won't stay on the ground.

text: Şimdi beni itliğini yaptığın beyine götürebilirsin
english: Now you can take me to the brain you've been pushing.

text: Ertuğrul'un fitnelerine inanacak kadar saf olduğunu düşünürdüm
english: I thought you were naive enough to believe in Ertugrul's trials.
You have an eye for my father's company.

text: Beni ezip geçmek için Ertuğrul'u kullandın
english: You used Ertugrul to crush me.
Alan's in, he's in, he's in, huh?
I'll turn this land into a bloodbath

text: Buraya sana veda etmeye geldim abi

Even on the way to the execution
You talk about blood, you talk about war.
My battle isn't over yet Aliyar
My child will have my revenge.

text: Ecelin benim elimden olmasa da evladımın elinden olacak!
english: Even if your death is not by my hand, it will be by my son's hand!

text: O sabi senin gibi olmayacak abi!
english: He won't be like you, brother!
Stay away from my child, Aliyar!
Father, Aliyar will not see my child!
I won't give you my blessing!
He won't, I won't give him my blessing!

text: Bunu görmek zorunda değilsin. Dilersen gidebiliriz
english: You don't have to see this.
No, my father died in my arms.

text: Ona bunu yapanın da öldüğünü görmek isterim
english: I'd like to see whoever did this to him die, too.
Mr. Ertugrul will do the execution.

text: Son bir diyeceğin var mı Ural Bey?

text: Ertuğrul Bey, sen de bilesin ki
benim kanım toprağa düşüp kuruyuncaya kadar
english: Until my blood falls to the ground and dries up.
You're going to get wiped out, too.
That's the price you pay for what you've done.
You will surely pay for your slander!
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
I can't stay here like this.
I can't let my son get killed.
I won't let my son be killed!

text: Sen mi benim oğlumun katili olacaksın?
english: Are you going to be the murderer of my son?
If you hurt my son's hair
And the women that Sultan sent

text: Beni de, obamı da isyana mecbur etmeyin!
english: Don't make me and my obas rebel!
I'll turn it into a pool of blood

text: bu çobanlarla mı sulhu sağlayacaksın Emir Sadeddin?

You're the only one left, girl.
Don't leave it on the floor.

text: İkiniz de belanızı bulacaksınız! İkiniz de!

text: Bunun bedeli ağır olur dedim değil mi?

english: Aslihan, I swear you'll die too!
I swear I'll get my revenge!
Killer, shut up, Aslihan, shut up!
If you want me to be your girl

The prisoner will be held at the inn until the execution.
You're in charge of his safety.

I'll say goodbye and come back.
You'll be crushed under this inn!

text: Bu hiç iyi olmadı Artuk Bey

text: Ana, siz burada bekleyin. Mesele büyümesin

text: Babamın kanını yerde koymadın Sana minnettarım Ertuğrul Bey

You found the killers, they're all going to pay.
I'd like to know what happened to Laskaris.
I'm ready, Commander Vasilius. We can go.
It's your duty to keep the peace.

text: Sulhu de, huzuru da bozan sizlersiniz
english: You're the ones who are disrupting the peace and the peace.
Even when you're eating bones thrown in front of you

text: Başın sağ olsun Aliyar Bey Sağ olasın beyim

text: Adaletin yükü bu kadar ağır mı olur?

text: Adalet, iki ucu keskin pusattır Aliyar Bey

text: Yeri gelir, tutanın da elini keser

text: Başsız, sersefil bir obanın küllerini bıraktın ardında

text: Sultan'ımızın istediği; cenk için hazır olmamız

text: Bu dünyada da, ahirette de müjde onlaradır

text: Keşke Ertuğrul'u gördüğünde de böyle düşünseydin

Ural's voice makes the inn moan, son.

text: Ölümü beklemek, en azılı katili dahi yaptıklarını sorgulamaya iter ana
english: Waiting for death makes the most violent killer question what he's done, Mother.
As Ural's death approached, his regret grew.

text: Candar Bey'i kaybedince iyice kendinden geçti
english: When he lost Candar Bey, he passed out.
Why don't you take him to the night-room?
I'll think about it too, Ma.
It's our custom to show mercy to those who fall.
Ural will be punished, but now
When you say push, you mean push.

text: Meydan Ertuğrul'la iş birlikçisi Aliyar'a kaldı
english: The square was left to Ertuğrul and his co-conspirator Aliyar

text: Bütün Türkmen obaları o bayrak altında birleşecek
english: All Turkmen obas will unite under that flag

text: Demek ki Aliyar'ı öldürmenin vakti geldi
english: So it's time to kill Aliyar

text: O vakit Ertuğrul daha da güçlenir ahmak!
english: Then Ertuğrul will grow stronger, you idiot!
So what are you going to do, sir?

text: İmparatorumuzdan bir mektup geldi Komutan Vasilius
english: A letter from our Emperor, Commander Vasilius.
Take the Alps with you, Turgut.
You'll take Ural to his cabin.
I'd like him to spend his last night in his office.
You're in charge of your safety, Turgut.
He's assigned me to run the castle.

text: Benim asıl istediğim Türkleri topraklarımızdan atmak
english: What I really want is to get the Turks off our land.
Tekfur's killers have found their punishment.
Don't make a big deal out of it.
He said to keep the peace.

text: Helena sizi görmek ister Komutan Vasilius
english: Helena would like to see you, Commander Vasilius.

text: Helena'nın beni görmesi hiç iyi olmaz
english: It's not good for Helena to see me.

text: Az önce imparatorumuzdan bir mektup geldi
english: We just received a letter from our emperor.
I know you mourn your father.

text: Belki de bu yas bittiğinde bu topraklardan gideceksin
english: Maybe when this mourning is over, you'll leave this land.
I'd like you to stay here with me.

text: Yanımda kal. Burası senin yuvandı Hep öyle olacak
english: Stay with me, this was your home, always will be.

text: İzin ver, ben de bu yuvanın bir parçası olayım
english: Let me be a part of this nest

text: Türklerle savaşımda seni yanımda görmek isterim
english: I'd like to see you with me in my battle with the Turks.
It's my father's will, Commander Vasilius.

text: Kalede kalıp, onun hatırasına sahip çıkmak isterim
english: I'd like to stay in the castle and keep his memory.

text: Barış için elimden gelen her şeyi yaparım
english: I'll do everything in my power to make peace

text: Laskaris denen o caniye ne yapacağınızı bilmek isterim Komutan Vasilius
english: I'd like to know what you're going to do to that villain Laskaris, Commander Vasilius.
I'll do what your father wants, Helena.
Thanks to Laskaris inside this castle

text: Her şeyi öğrenmek isterim Komutan Vasilius
english: I'd like to know everything, Commander Vasilius.

text: Ertuğrul gibi Aliyar'ı da öldürecek tek bir kişi var
english: Like Ertugrul, there is only one person who will kill Aliyar.
How are you going to save Ural from being executed?
With Helena's testimony, who saw you.
The Turkishmen in the vicinity are silent now

text: Çavdar Obası'nın başına kim geçecek onu beklemekte
english: Who's going to be in charge of the Rye Obama waiting for him?

text: Aliyar Bey geçerse evvela bizimle ittifak yapacaktır beyim
english: If Mr. Aliyar passes, he'll make an alliance with us first.
♪ When the power of rye and apricots is combined ♪

text: Türkmen obaları da bize destek olacaklardır
english: The Turkmen obas will be there to support us.
This unit will break Vasilius' accounts.

text: İznik İmparatoru da güçlendiğimizi ve birlik olduğumuzu görünce
english: And when the Emperor of Iznik saw that we were strong and united

text: Vasilius, Aliyar Bey'in seçilmesini istemeyecektir beyim
english: Vasilius won't want Mr. Aliyar elected, sir.

text: Engel olmak için elinden geleni yapacaktır
english: He'll do whatever he can to stop it.

text: Doğrudan müdahil olup, sulhu bozmayı göze alamaz
english: He can't afford to interfere directly and disrupt the peace.

text: Bizden Laskaris'i istemesinin altında da bu neden yatmaktadır
english: That's why he asked us for Laskaris.

text: Beyim, bu Vasilius'un kenetlenmiş düşman istemediğini biliriz, lakin
english: My lord, we know this Vasilius does not want a united enemy, but
I can't even talk about it.

text: o da bu işin bir parçasıdır belli ki
english: It's part of the job, obviously.
What does he try to do?

text: Bir fitne çıkarmazsa gözüne uyku girmez
english: He won't be able to sleep if he doesn't put out a fit.

text: Yine bir musibet var ve yine tam ortasında
english: There's another plague, and it's right in the middle of it.
You know what he put us through, son?

text: bana olan öfkesinden herkesle ittifak kuracak hale gelmiştir ana
english: With his anger at me, he's made an alliance with everyone, Mother.
What did he say to Vasilius?
What did he want, what did he promise?

text: Bunları öğrenemediğimiz sürece tek gözümüz kördür ana
english: As long as we don't find out, our only eyes are blind, Mother.

text: Görünen o ki imparatorluğumuz için bize büyük bir görev biçtiniz
english: It seems you've put us in a great position for our empire.

text: ikiniz de yapmak için doğduğunuz şeyi yapacaksınız
english: You'll both do what you were born to do.
You'll be a hero to our empire.
Your names will echo in this land

text: Yeni doğan bebeklere sizin isminizi verecekler; Petrus ve Laskaris!
english: They will name newborns after you, Peter and Laskaris!

text: Şu iğreti dünyada çekeceğiniz küçücük bir acı
english: A little pain in this world that you're going to suffer.
It will bring you closer to the sky
Just tell Dog that Ural is innocent

text: Laskaris'in seninle iş birliği yaparak ona iftira attığınızı söyleyeceğim
english: I'll tell him you framed Laskaris by cooperating with you.

text: Siz de itiraf edeceksiniz tabii ki
english: And you will confess, of course.

text: Böylece bu iş Tapınakçıların üzerine kalacak
english: That way, the Templars will take over.

text: Ertuğrul seni görür görmez ikna olacak
english: Ertugrul will be convinced as soon as he sees you.

text: onu öldürmeye çalıştığınızda seni görmüştü değil mi?
english: He saw you when you tried to kill him, didn't he?

text: Petrus, hemen kaçmamız lazım Sen önden gidip atları hazırla
english: Peter, we must flee immediately. You go ahead and prepare the horses.
The notebooks I smuggled from the temple.

text: Yeryüzünde bu idamı durdurabilecek tek kanıt, o defterler ve sensin
english: The only evidence on earth that can stop this execution is you and those notebooks.
I think you understand me, Peter.

text: Siz suçlu ilan edileceksiniz Hatta işkence göreceksiniz
english: You'll be declared guilty. You'll even be tortured.
You can live with that, can't you?

text: Daha önce Laskaris'i koruduğum gibi bu sefer ikinizi birden koruyacağım
english: I will protect both of you this time, as I have protected Laskaris before.
Send a messenger to Emir Sadeddin
That I invited him to the castle.

text: ve sulhun devamı için derhal görüşmem gerektiğini bildirin ona
english: And let him know that I must meet with him immediately for the continuation of the peace.
Is there a sign, Your Highness?

text: Beni emretmişsiniz Emir Hazretleri Şeref duydum
english: You've ordered me, Your Highness. I'm honored.

text: İmdi beni iyi dinleyesin Acar Bey
english: Now listen to me carefully, Mr. Acar.

text: Bu diyeceklerimi de obadaki diğer beylere söyleyesin
english: Tell that to the other gentlemen in the room.

text: Zira diyeceklerim obanızın akıbeti için pek mühimdir
english: Indeed, the outcome of your Obama is very important.
You're going to be asked to be the master of ryes.

text: Çavdarlar liyakat sahibi ve sadık bir beyin hükmü altında olmalı
english: Rye must be ruled by a true and loyal brain.

text: Benim ve haliyle devletimizin teveccühü bu yöndedir
english: That's what the government and I are grateful for.

text: size ve devletime olan saygım sonsuzdur Emir Hazretleri
english: I have the utmost respect for you and my government, Your Highness.

text: Siz nasıl münasip gördüyseniz öyle olacaktır
english: It will be just as you see fit.

text: Bari son gecemde huzur ver bana
english: At least give me peace on my last night

text: Yaptıklarından sonra son gecendeki huzuru değil
english: Not the peace of your last night after what you've done.

text: ahirette çekeceğin cehennem azabını düşün Ural Bey
english: Think of the hell you'll suffer in the afterlife, Mr. Ural.

text: Canına kıydığın onca masum insanın anasını, babasını
english: All the innocent people you've killed, their parents.
Think of your brothers, your kids, your chicks.

text: Düşün ki neden burada olduğunu unutmayasın

english: Why should you remember that your breath is numbered?
I know why my breath is numbered, Ertugrul.
I can't breathe because I didn't kill you.
Because of your slander, my breath is numbered.
It turns out I didn't kill Tekfur.
When it turns out I didn't do those things.
What are you gonna do, huh?

text: Ben tefekkür etmeden tek bir nefes dahi almam Ural Bey
english: I don't take a breath without considering it, Mr. Ural.
I don't blame anyone without proof.

text: Adalet terazisini şaşırtanlar senin gibi gaflete düşenlerdir
english: Those who lead astray the scales of justice are indeed heedless like you.

text: Ben anca o teraziyi koruyan Allah'ın bir kuluyum
english: I am only a servant of God who keeps the balance.
If you knew you were a servant
If only you hadn't forgotten it was your time.
Not the lives of innocent people.
♪ You'd bury your anger, your ambition ♪
Are you here to lecture me?
If you think I'll fall at your feet
If you expect me to ask you for forgiveness
Wait till the end of time!

text: Obamı eline geçirmek için her şeyi yaptın
english: You did everything you could to get your hands on my oba.
You took my father, my brothers from me.

text: İmdi de canımı alacaksın Daha ne istersin?
english: You're gonna kill me now. What more do you want?
I'm not here to lecture you.
Or listen to you beg for forgiveness.

text: Babanın cenazesine götürmek için vazifelendirildim seni
english: I was assigned to take you to your father's funeral.
Spend your last night with your family.

text: Bu senin son isteğin olarak kabul edilecek
english: It will be accepted as your last request.
I have a wish from you.

text: Elimden gelen bir şeyse yaparım bilirsin
english: If there's anything I can do, you know I'll do it.

text: Lakin abimi bu iftiradan kurtaramadınız Demek elinizden bu gelmedi
english: But you couldn't save my brother from this slander. So that's not the best you could do.
Let Ertugrul pay for what he's done.
If we want a strong government

text: o vakit hayatın bazı gerçeklerine riayet etmek mecburiyetindeyiz
english: Then we must observe some of life's realities.

text: Ural'ı kurtaracak delilim yoktu Olaydı onu kurtarırdım, bilirsin
english: I didn't have any evidence to save Ural. It was an incident. I'd save him, you know.

text: İmdi de Ertuğrul'dan intikam almamı istersin
english: Now you want me to take revenge on Ertugrul.

text: Lakin bu da öyle kolay değildir

english: I see your father resented by your brother's pain.

text: Eğer bu işler nizamla, kanunla yürüseydi abim de, babam da yanımda olurdu
english: If this had worked in order, with the law, both my brother and father would have been with me.

text: Lakin Ertuğrul ne nizam dinler ne kanun Her işini hileyle bitirir
english: But Ertuğrul doesn't obey the law and the law does everything by deceit.

text: Sen ne dediğinin farkında mısın Aslıhan?
english: Do you know what you're saying, Aslihan?
You want him to get revenge by cheating.

text: Asıl siz benden ne istediğinizin farkında mısınız?
english: Do you realize what you're asking me to do?
You want me to marry you?

text: Size sadık bir eş olmamı istiyorsanız
english: If you want me to be a faithful wife to you
If you'll excuse me, Your Highness.
We're going to Karacahisar Castle, sir.
Yes, sir, I'm at your service.

text: Biz senin hizmetlerinden memnunuz Haçaturyan Usta
english: We are pleased with your services, Master Crusader.

text: İmdiye kadar gösterdiğiniz gayret bizi ziyadesiyle memnun etmiştir
english: We are very pleased with the effort you've made so far.
I have a new request for you.

text: İstek ne demek beyim, emrin olur
english: What's a request, sir? It's your order.
But this mission is a little dangerous.
Feel free to take it or leave it.

text: Canım sana feda olsun Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: I'll sacrifice my life to you, Mr. Ertugrul.
You're going to open a shop there.

text: Lakin bu dükkândaki amacımız ticaret yapmak değil
english: But we don't want to trade in this store.

text: kaleye kim gelir, kim gider, orada ne yapar, bunları öğrenmek olacaktır
english: Find out who comes to the castle, who goes to the castle, what they do there.

text: Dumrul bu işlerde senin yardımcın olacak
english: Dumrul will be your assistant in all this.

text: Kaleden gelecek her malumat Kayıların geleceği için son derece mühimdir
english: Any information from the castle is crucial to the future of the Apricots.
I was just a dead man.

text: Ne yapsam, ne yapsam senin hakkını ödeyemem ki
english: No matter what I do, no matter what I do, I can't pay you back.
He'll sacrifice his way for yours.
Thank you, Master Crossaturyan. Thank you.

text: Vakit kaybetmeden Dumrul'la beraber yola çıkın
english: Leave with Dumrul in no time
Make your way to Karacahisar Castle.

text: Kalede dükkân açmak için ne gereklidir ne yapmamız gerekir araştırın
english: Find out what we need to do to open a shop in the castle.
You made a promise to my brother-in-law.

text: Şuracıkta canımı teslim etmiyorsam evladımı düşündüğüm içindir
english: If I'm not giving up my life right now, it's because I'm thinking about my son.

text: Lakin daha ne kadar dayanırım bilemem
english: But I don't know how long I'll last.

text: Alpler, Ural Bey’imi getirdi Aslıhan Hatun
english: The Alps brought my Mr. Ural Aslıhan Hatun

text: Demek bu sefer beni kalenin yeni Tekfur'u olarak ağırlarsın
english: So this time you'll welcome me as the new Tekfur of the castle.

text: Emir Sadeddin bunca şeyi nereden öğrenir diye merak eder dururum
english: I wonder where Emir Sadeddin would find out about all this.
That's what it's called to be a state, Vasilius.
You should be afraid of what you don't know.

text: Lakin benim de bilmek istediğim şeyler var elbet
english: But there are things I want to know.

text: buraya kadar çağırmanın nedenini merak ederim
english: I wonder why you called me here.

text: Sana, sizin şerbetinizden ikram etmek isterim
english: I would like to offer you some of your sherbet.

text: Bu sefer ikramım bol hazırlıklıyım yani
english: This time I'm well prepared for the treat.
I'd like to hear what you have to say.
I know you want Ural to live.

text: Candar Bey'in ölümünden sonra bunu en az senin kadar ben de isterim
english: After Mr. Candar's death, I want this as much as you do.

text: Aliyar'ın bey olması demek, Ertuğrul'un güçlenmesi
english: Aliyar is a gentleman, Ertuğrul's strength

text: başımıza daha büyük bir bela olması demek
english: It means we're in a lot of trouble.

text: Beni buraya bildiğim şeylerin tekrarı için mi çağırdın?
english: You called me here for a repeat of what I know?
Ural is innocent, he didn't kill Tekfur.
So you have to stop the execution.
You're saying things I know again.

text: kendi süfli devletinin adaletiyle karıştırdın galiba
english: I think you're mistaken for the justice of your own sophisticated state.

text: Biz delil olmadan hüküm vermez hüküm bozmayız
Sizin adalete ne denli bağlı olduğunuzu bilirim
english: I know how loyal you are to justice.
That's why I'll give you the evidence.
I questioned him in his own language.
And guess what I found out.

text: Bu olanların hepsi Tapınakçıların işi Hepsi!
english: This is all the work of Templars!

text: Bizi ve Türkmenleri içten yıkmak için türlü tuzaklar kurarlar
english: They'll set up all kinds of traps to destroy us and the Turkmen from the inside.

text: Tekfur'u öldürüp, Ural'ın üzerine suçu attılar
english: They killed Tekfur and framed Ural.

text: Bu masalları doğrulayacak delilin vardır inşallah
english: I hope you have proof to corroborate these tales.
The Templar's records, they're all in there.

text: Tüccar Hasan'ı bulduğum yerden çekip çıkardım
english: I pulled the merchant Hassan out of the place where I found him.

text: Kayı kılığında kervanı basıp mabeyinciyi öldüren de Petrus'tu
english: It was Peter who drove the caravan and killed the bailiff dressed as a apricot.

text: Helena onu görür görmez tanıyacak Ertuğrul da öyle
english: So will Ertugrul, who will recognize her as soon as Helena sees him.

text: bu kadar delil yeterli mi Emir Sadeddin?
english: Is that enough evidence, Emir Sadeddin?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imiz, son gecesini ailesiyle geçirsin
english: Let Mr. Ertugrul spend his last night with his family.
He sent me to say good-bye.
My head is still in the hands of the executioner
The pain you put in my father's shroud
You'll remember for the rest of your life.
And the justice you so stand for
He was my father too, brother.

text: Lakin hesaplaşmanın ne yeri ne vaktidir
english: But it's not the time or place of reckoning.
What will we settle with you, Aliyar?
We shall deal with you in the Hereafter.
With my hand on the side
With my father's hand on the side
In this life and in the Hereafter.
And put the account in the Hereafter.
It's the work of a man who's not afraid of his work.
Whose hand will be on whose neck
You were right to bring my brother.
May Allah bless our Lord Ertuğrul
If it were up to me
What are you going to do now, Mr. Aliyar?
Oba doesn't go without a head
We pick the green, we pick the gentleman, we pick the turgut.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im de, biz de gayrı Çavdarlarla bir olmak isteriz
english: Mr. Ertugrul and I would like to be one with the other rye.

text: Bu birliği de ancak sen sağlarsın
english: You're the only one who can provide this unity.
You must be the master of Oban.
You've passed away with my pain
You left me with your pain.
What are you still doing here?

text: Kutluca, diğer Alplerle beraber sabaha dek nöbet tutacak Aslıhan
english: Kutluca will keep watch with the other Alps until morning Aslıhan

text: Abimi bu katillere mi teslim edersin Aliyar?
english: You'd hand my brother over to these murderers, Aliyar?

text: Abimin canını acıtmak için her şeyi yaparsın
english: You'd do anything to hurt my brother.
Get out of my sight, both of you!
As a matter of fact, Hatun, I'll take care of Ural.
You've got to know your place!
What time will the execution take place, Turgut?
Let a funeral be buried first.

text: Ee, şerbet getireyim sana Dur Bamsı, dur hele, ne şerbeti?
english: Well, let me get you some sherbet. Wait, wait, wait, wait. What syrup?
You're obviously not in your right mind.

text: Hayırdır, nedir seni böyle derde sokan?
Lakin ben hiç böyle olmamıştım beyim
english: But I've never been like this, sir.
I say no, I slap myself

text: Beyim, beyim, aç kalırım, tok kalırım Ayı gibi yerim beyim
english: My lord, my lord, I'll starve, I'll eat like a bear I'll eat like a bear

text: Lakin ne edersem edeyim ne yaparsam yapayım
english: But no matter what I do
I can't stop thinking about it, sir.

text: Sevda önce başa, sonra gönle mıhlanırmış
english: Love is nailed to the head, then nailed to the eye.

text: Gönle mıhlandı mı bir daha da oradan çıkmaz
english: When the heart is nailed, it won't come out of there again.

text: kurbanın olayım da de hele ne edeceğim?
english: If I'm your victim, what am I supposed to do?
First, you have to be patient, Bamsi.
Then the fire in your heart
You're gonna wait for him to fall in your heart, too.
If she falls in love with you too

text: Yani, yani beyim, sevenler kavuşur o vakit dersin ha?
english: So, sir, you say the lovers will meet them then, huh?

text: Böyle cenge girsen seni sağ koymazlar
english: If you go to war like this, they won't let you live.
Come on, pack up. Come on.
Yes, sir. You have your orders, sir.
Bamsy Beyrek, get your shit together.
Wait for the fever to fall

text: Bamsı Beyrek, önünde hiçbir mani kalmayacak
english: Bamsi Beyrek, you'll have nothing to stand in your way

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey,
From a heart that's not afraid
From the evil of the enemy when it appears
They'll set up my kids, our oba.

text: bu hain tuzakları onların başlarına musallat eyle
english: Lead them to these treacherous plots.

text: onun yolunda cihat eden yiğit Alplerimi
english: My brave Alps who jihad in his way

text: her daim muzaffer eyle ya Rabbim
english: May you always be victorious, Lord.

text: Muhakkak ki sen her duayı duyarsın
Efendimiz Hazreti Muhammed Mustafa yüzü suyu hürmetine
english: Our Lord Muhammad Mustafa's face in honor of the water

text: sen dualarımızı kabul eyle ya Rabbi güzel Allah'ım
english: Answer our prayers, O good Lord.

text: Uyku, beni Süleyman Şah'ımla birlikte terk etti oğul
english: Sleep has left me with my king, Solomon, son.
I'll see, and you're upset about sleeping.

text: Uykuya yüzümü döneli çok oldu ana
english: It's been a long time since I've been back to sleep, Ma.
I can't see out of range anymore.

text: Lakin ne vakit zalimi ateşe atsam
english: But every time I throw the tyrant into the fire
There's always someone else burning with you.
That's how his death was written.
May God forgive you for your sins.
You did it for the right.

text: Adaleti tesis etmek için çabaladın durdun
english: You've been trying to establish justice.
Don't ever give up the fight.
No matter what happens with my blood, with my life
I'm always behind you, just so you know.
Just so you know, it's because of your prayers.
May Allah keep you in mind.

text: Allah rahmet eyleye, mekânı cennet ola inşallah
english: May God have mercy on you. May your place be a paradise.
May God have mercy on him.
May his place be in heaven.
I'm sorry for your loss. Thank you.

text: Allah rahmet eylesin Başınız sağ olsun
english: May God have mercy on you. I'm sorry for your loss.

text: Gidelim de bir an önce bitsin bu iş

english: No, you're not coming with me.
In fact, take care of your sister-in-law.
Aliyar, I don't give you my blessing.
I made you a sherbet, sir.
Let it refresh you on this difficult day
But I want you to know
For the relief of my heart

text: O güzel gözlerini benden esirgeme yeter
english: Just keep your beautiful eyes on me.

text: Benim gözlerim senin huzuruna amadedir Ertuğrul
english: My eyes are in your presence, Ertuğrul.

text: Senin ne vakit böyle yüzün gülse
english: Every time you smile like that

text: ben de, evladımız da mutluluktan ne edeceğiz bilmeyiz
english: Neither I nor our child know what to do with happiness

text: Size olan hasretim Tanrı dağı kadar büyük
english: My longing for you is as great as the mountain of God
It's as strong as the Orhun River
I'm right in the middle of the Line Bridge, Halima.

text: Önüm de, ardım da düşman doludur
english: My front and my rear are full of enemies

text: Lakin ne vakit nefesim kesilse hep sizi düşünürüm
english: But when I'm out of breath, I think of you all the time.

text: Bu dava bittiğinde beraber nefes alalım Ertuğrul
english: When this case is over let's breathe together Ertugrul
Let's run our horses like we used to
Everyone will tell the story of Mr. Ertugrul
My master is very busy today.

text: Ben her vakti yamacında olacağım beyim
english: I'll always be on your side, sir.

text: Var mıdır beyimin benden bir isteği?
english: Is there anything my lord would like from me?
You've come, you've made me smile, you've made me feel better

text: Size bahsettiğim diğer dükkân da burasıdır
english: This is the other shop I told you about.
It's a little small for my other stores.
Does this place have a cellar?
He's got a big cellar down there.

text: Efendim, siz burada ne iş yapmak istiyorsunuz?
english: Sir, what do you want to do here?

text: ünlü tüccar Büyük Alven'in ismini hiç duymadın?
english: You've never heard of the famous merchant, Alven the Great?

text: Ben tüm cihanı gezer, en güzel malları bulur, ahaliye sunarım
english: I travel all the jihad, find the most beautiful goods, offer them to the people.
I make people happy. I get the sixths.

text: Eğer kiralamak istersek ne yapmamız lazım?
english: What should we do if we want to rent it?
Sir, this is our old Tekfur's place.

text: Kendisi öldüğü için mirası kızına kalmıştır
english: Since he's dead, his daughter inherits his inheritance.

text: Karar verdiğiniz vakit bu evraklarla birlikte
english: When you've made up your mind, along with these documents,
You need to talk to Miss Helena about the matter.
We'll take care of whatever we need.
As a matter of fact, don't let anything happen to my child.
Put your swords in your sheath
I'm here to surrender to you.

text: rahmetli Candar Bey'e olan sadakatinizi gözlerinizde görürüm
english: I see your loyalty to the late Candar Bey in your eyes
That's why I stood before you.
My faith in your dignity is complete.
Now you can either take me to the oba.

text: Çavdar Obası'nı eski kudretli günlerine kavuştururuz
english: We'll bring the Rye Obama back to its old glory days.
Just so you know, I'm not a traitor.

text: Ben Ural Bey'imin emirlerini yerine getirdim
english: I did what Mr. Ural told me to do.

text: Lakin Ural Bey hainin önde gidenidir
english: But Mr. Ural is a traitor.

text: Hem de bildiğinizden çok daha fazla
english: A lot more than you know.
Just like he killed Mr. Toktami

text: bacısı Aslıhan Hatun'u da eşkıyaya yem edecek kadar sefilin tekidir
english: Her sister is miserable enough to feed Aslihan Hatun to the bandits.

text: Ertuğrul Bey Hanlı Pazar'da onun kellesini alacak
english: Mr. Ertugrul will take his head on Sunday.
He will be buried in his sins, Batuhan.
But where is the proof of those words?
I'm a witness to the events.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'in altın madenine çökmek için eşkıyayla anlaştığının da
english: And that Mr. Ertugrul made a deal with the bandit to go down to the gold mine.
We lost the baby Aslıhan Hatun
Cholpan Hatun has lost a lot of blood

text: evvela her birinizden Allah razı olsun
english: First, God bless each and every one of you.
But our custom is also known
Our late master is in the ground
Our new master must also take office.

text: Babam Candar Bey'den boşalan beylik makamına
english: My father from Mr. Candar to the gentleman's office.

text: Kol kırılır, yen içinde kalır Aliyar Bey
english: The arm breaks, the yen stays inside Mr. Aliyar

text: Sen obamızın meselelerini ifşa ederek babanın ölümüne sebep oldun
english: You caused your father's death by exposing our Oba's affairs.

text: Bir de bu yetmez gibi bey olmak istersin
english: And if that's not enough, you want to be a gentleman.
Just so you know, what are these gentlemen here?

text: ne de ben buna müsaade etmeyiz

english: The title is my right before you.
While you roam in distant lands

text: ben obam için kan döktüm, ter döktüm
english: I've shed blood for my oba, I've sweated
I'm in favor of the head of the Rye Club.

text: görürüm ki Candar Bey'in cenazesinin akabinde toy kurulmuştur
english: I see that Mr. Candar was born young after his funeral.

text: Lakin bey seçmeden evvel bu toprağa vereceğimiz
english: But before the master chooses, we'll put him in the ground.

text: iki canımız daha vardır bunu bilesiniz
english: We've got two more lives, you should know that.

text: Onun vebali de şimdi huzurunuzda beylik dilenen Aliyar'ın üzerindedir
english: His plague is on Aliyar, who now begs your presence.

text: Cenazenin biri Ural Bey'inse diğer cenaze kimin Aslıhan Hatun?
english: If it's one of Mr. Ural's funerals, whose funeral is it?
Ural is my brother's unborn baby.
May God have mercy on you.

text: Çolpan Hatun bu haksızlığa ve acıya daha fazla dayanamamıştır
english: Cholpan Hatun couldn't stand this injustice and pain any longer.

text: Sizse burada beylik makamının derdine düşmüşsünüz
english: And here you are, concerned by the office of the court.

text: bilesin ki yitip giden canların vebali
english: Know that the plague of the dying souls
It's on you and Ertugrul Bey's shoulder.

text: En başından beri Ural Bey'in derdi madendi
english: From the very beginning, Mr. Ural's trouble was mine.

text: Tek derdi, Ertuğrul Bey'i öldürüp altına çökmekti
english: All he cared about was killing Mr. Ertugrul and going under.
It will restore the rye to its strength.

text: Hem siz kazanacaksınız hem de obamız kazanacak
english: You'll win, and our oba will win.
Or take me to the oba
You'll execute him like Mr. Ural

text: Şimdi güvendiğiniz bütün Alplerle yarın Keltepe’ye gelin
english: Now come to Keltepe tomorrow with all the Alps you trust

text: Sizi madene götüreceğim Kendi gözlerinizle görün
english: I'll take you to the mine. See for yourself.

text: Şimdi obaya gidin, söylediklerimi iyice bir düşünün
english: Now, go to the office, think about what I'm saying.
I'll believe your words are the truth, Batuhan.

text: ben de sonuna kadar seninleyim evelallah
english: I'm with you all the way, God willing.
In my blood, your lineage will drown quickly.
I have something to tell you.

text: Yeni vazifeniz hayırlı olsun Komutan Vasilius
english: Congratulations on your new assignment, Commander Vasilius.

text: Yeni bir fitne daha gelmiştir başımıza Hayme Hatun
english: There's been another trial, Hayme Hatun.
It's up to me to keep the peace.

text: Bu yüzden size bu iki katili getirdim
english: That's why I brought you these two killers.
I questioned the murderer who killed our Tekfur.

text: İşin içinden bir kişi daha çıktı
Hanlı Pazar ahalisinin Tüccar Hasan olarak bildiği Petrus
english: Peter, known as Trader Hassan by the people of the Hanlı Market
The man who staged our Taekfur's murder

text: Bu Petrus denen hain, Tekfur'umuzu Laskaris'e öldürttü
english: This traitor, Peter, had our Tekfur killed by Laskaris.

text: Suçu da masum Uray Bey'in üzerine attı
english: He blamed it on innocent Mr. Uray.
That the peace may be broken

text: Tapınakçılar, iki devleti savaşın eşiğine getirmiştir
english: Templars have brought two states to the brink of war
He has declared that the peace is with him.
We've all been played by Templars
That's the justice you've been talking about.

text: Şimdi sen de benim bu adaletimden nasibini alacaksın
english: Now you'll have my share of justice.

text: Söylediklerinin doğru olduğunu nereden bilelim Tekfur Vasilius?
english: How do we know what you're saying is true, Tekfur Vasilius?
First of all, you have to prove it.
I found it in Peter's lair.

text: Tekfur ve devletimiz için düşündükleri bütün fitneler bir bir içinde yazılı
english: All the trials they think of for our government are written in one.
You were attacked on your way to the castle.

text: Katillerin arasında bu adam da var mıydı?
english: Was this man among the killers?
It was the head of our attackers.
I saw with my own eyes that you killed your master.

text: Babanın ölüm emrini veren de oydu
english: He was the one who ordered your father's death.
